data.name: Puppeteer
data.detailed_description:
The Puppeteer is a first-person survival horror game. The soundtrack immerses you in the madness that the main character could experience being trapped in an abandoned school with a dead-walking clown who killed his friends.

About the story.


At a high school reunion, 5 friends accept a challenge and decide to visit an abandoned school that they were afraid of when they were children. Though, once they got there, things took a bad turn, and they started dying one by one.
Now, you have to defeat the clown and escape!

What awaits you:



IMMERSIVE EXPERIENCE
- Realistic graphics and sounds that will ensure a totally immersive experience that will keep you on your toes.

DAY AND NIGHT CYCLE
- Time is ticking, hurry up because he is hungry!

EXPLORATION
- Explore the school despite your fear and find a way to escape.

data.short_description: Following a challenge, 5 friends decided to enter an abandoned school, after entering the school, they realized that they made the biggest mistake of their lives.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3470 or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 2GB / AMD Radeon R9 280 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770 or AMD FX™-9590 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480 with 3GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
